id: Freelance Pro – Notion System for Product Designers
name: Freelance Pro – Notion System for Product Designers
description: Freelance Pro is a scalable Notion System that makes it easy to organize and grow your freelance UX design career.Organizing your freelance admin means you can instead focus more of your energy and time on what you love - design :) This system is split into two main parts: one for managing your own brand as a freelance designer and another for handling all your design projects.
